release_stage: Phase 3 - Autonomous CI/CD Execution & Intelligent Deployment
core_purpose: Transform AutoSync into a self-managed CI/CD system that can test, deploy, and roll back automatically based on performance feedback and version health.

updated.auto_feedback_engine.py: linked with deployment decisions based on KPI thresholds
updated.trend_analytics.py: feeds performance data to rollback manager

change_summary.notes: Deployment and rollback logic are now controlled by data-driven performance feedback, with human approval optional but not required.

new_python_modules.autodeploy_orchestrator.py: Main engine that connects CI/CD pipeline, evaluates KPI trends, and executes deployment or rollback actions autonomously.
new_python_modules.rollback_manager.py: Monitors deployed builds and performs automatic rollback if performance regression is detected.
new_python_modules.ci_cd_health_monitor.py: Tracks end-to-end system health, latency, and error rates during deployment windows.
new_python_modules.deploy_status_dashboard.py: Real-time UI for visualizing deployment progress, success/failure states, and auto-decisions.

new_markdown_docs.v2_2_autonomous_cicd_plan.md: Explains end-to-end flow of self-deployment logic, from feedback to live rollout.
new_markdown_docs.v2_2_deployment_risk_matrix.md: Defines risk thresholds, rollback triggers, and impact mitigation strategies.

ci_cd_flow.1: Detect code or config change via GitHub webhook
ci_cd_flow.2: Run unit, integration, and regression tests automatically
ci_cd_flow.4: If performance ≥ threshold → proceed to deploy
ci_cd_flow.5: If regression detected → rollback_manager.py executes auto rollback

risk_matrix.description: False-positive rollback due to transient data spikes.
risk_matrix.mitigation: Add moving-average smoothing to KPI analysis before rollback trigger.
Add queue priority system in autodeploy_orchestrator.

risk_matrix.description: Risk of deploying unstable configs due to missing validation.

dependencies.runtime_env: Python 3.12 + GitHub Actions + SQLite + Custom Queue Engine

next_steps: Finalize lessons_to_action feedback loop for rollback optimization
